sentences.english: Thoughout the last decade the Internet has become an important tool of communication.

sentences.chinese: 他还说，中国正在加大网际网路的监管力度。

sentences.english: URL: in full Uniform Resource Locator, Address of a resource on the Internet.

sentences.english: Internet video junkies will be happy to know that Mux is totally free of charge.

sentences.english: A: Do you use the internet a lot?
sentences.chinese: 你经常使用网际网路吗？

sentences.english: In the evening , I watched TV and surfed the Internet for two hours .
sentences.chinese: 在晚上，我看电视和浏览了网际网路二个小时。

sentences.english: Routers are the backbone devices of large intranets and of the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 路由器是大型企业内网路和网际网路的骨干装置。

sentences.english: Since the advent of the Internet, it has become much easier to find information.
sentences.chinese: 自从网际网路的来临，查资料变得容易多了。
